bodyShape.name: Inverted Triangle
bodyShape.description: An inverted triangle body shape is characterized by broader shoulders, a wider bust, and a narrower waist and hips. The upper body, especially the shoulders and bust, is more prominent compared to the lower body, creating a triangle-like shape with the base at the shoulders and the point at the hips.

bodyShape.name: Pear
bodyShape.description: A pear body shape is characterized by wider hips, fuller thighs, and a narrower bust and shoulders. The lower body is more prominent compared to the upper body, creating a triangular silhouette.

bodyShape.name: Apple
bodyShape.description: An apple body shape is characterized by a larger bust, rounded shoulders, a fuller midsection, and slimmer arms, legs, and hips. The weight tends to be concentrated in the abdominal area, giving the body a rounder or oval appearance.
